title: The great crypto crackdown: Police have frozen up to Â£6MILLION of digital currencies since getting powers to stop criminals funding terrorism and laundering ill-gotten gains
description: Criminals have been increasingly using digital currencies such as Bitcoin to launder money, dodge taxes and fund terrorism. Ministers last April launched a crackdown on the 'emerging threat'.

description: Senator David McCormick (R-Pennsylvania) recently bought shares of Bitwise Bitcoin ETF (NYSEARCA:BITB).
